title: Charcoal Portraits & Studies
subtitle: a collection of charcoal drawings
description: I took up charcoal drawing because it allowed me to express great depth with simple materials. Several of these portraits are from a class I took where I refined my technique by attempting to copy works drawn by masters of the craft. Several others are my own studies in light and shadow.

title: Urban Ecosystem on Film
subtitle: a collection of 35mm film photographs
description: In the minds of many, the urban landscape is as far from nature as one could possibly get, but after living in Chicago for many years, I've come to appreciate that a city is itself an ecosystem. We are just as much a part of our surroundings as other flaura and fauna. I've put together a collection of film photographs that showcase nature's integration in the city.

title: Web Design
subtitle: this portfolio, along with my personal portfolio website
description: I've worked as a software engineer for many years now, so I decided to use this portfolio as a way to showcase my skills in graphic design and software engineering. I chosea simple pallette to avoid distraction, and designed reusable components for displaying the portfolio contents.
